definition: generic name for hemp, flax etc/hemp or flax fiber for textile materials/sesame/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/(of materials) rough or coarse/pocked/pitted/to have pins and needles or tingling/to feel numb
to save/to economize/to do without/to omit/to leave out/province/(archaic) central government department
to inspect/to examine/to be aware/to pay a visit (to one's parents or elders)
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

sentences.english: Yasheng Huang teaches international management at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology.
sentences.chinese: 黄亚生在麻省理工学院教国际管理。

sentences.english: Bernanke's thesis adviser at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology.
sentences.chinese: 他曾是贝南克在麻省理工学院的论文顾问。

sentences.english: Why did you choose to come to MIT?
sentences.chinese: 你为什么选择麻省理工学院呢？

sentences.english: I'm Shigeru Miyagawa. I teach in MIT.
sentences.chinese: 我是宫川茂，我在麻省理工学院教书。

sentences.english: I attended MIT where I majored in Electrical Engineering.
sentences.chinese: 我参加了我在麻省理工学院，主修电机工程。

sentences.english: Back at MIT,Li Huei Tsai had also discovered something new.
sentences.chinese: 回到麻省理工学院，黎乎诶仔也发现了一些新的东西。

sentences.english: In 1995, I received my MBA from MIT.
sentences.chinese: 1995年，我从麻省理工学院获得企管硕士学位。

sentences.english: She met Rapoport and me at an MIT gym.
sentences.chinese: 她在麻省理工学院体育馆与拉波波特和我相遇。

sentences.english: Yeah, MIT's filled with geniuses. That's for sure.
sentences.chinese: 麻省理工学院到处都是天才，这是无疑地。

sentences.english: Assignments of Introduction to Algorithms, Fall 2004 Samples 5-1 .
sentences.chinese: 麻省理工学院算法导论2004作业五的实例一。

sentences.english: Are there any non-science-oriented courses in MIT?
sentences.chinese: 在麻省理工学院，有没有非科学类的课程呢？

sentences.english: Now, morris is the professor with crackajack Masschusetts Institute of Technology.
sentences.chinese: 而今，莫里斯是麻省理工学院杰出的教授。

sentences.english: Time for M. I. T. 's Clean Energy Prize.
sentences.chinese: 又到麻省理工学院清洁能源奖的时间了。

sentences.english: Then in 1997 Mr. Behnke announced that he was leaving MIT.
sentences.chinese: 1997年，本克先生宣布他将要离开麻省理工学院。

sentences.english: This course is a core requirement for the Geotechnical Master of Engineering program at MIT.
sentences.chinese: 此课程为麻省理工学院大地工程硕士班之核心课程。

sentences.english: It's one of the texts of the MIT course mentioned above.
sentences.chinese: 它是上面的提到的麻省理工学院课程使用的教材之一。
